amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $1.7 billion provided for counternarcotics funding for Colombia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 106-549 to strike Title I from the bill. Title I deals with the Counternarcotics.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ramstad amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 262 (Roll no. 86).
